Get a list of Groups

get.groups.Rd

Creates a list of research groups included in the database.

get.groups(ver = "upd")

Arguments

ver

Version of the database. Default is upd, for the latest version.

Value

A data frame containing research groups included the database.

Examples

get.groups()

#> 4            Kömp
